title: (x) "She's Quirky" bold script - Eclat {Marcelo R}
content:
Could someone please help me identify this font? or at least fonts similar to it?

 [‹ (x) Display and text serif face in Italian newspaper - H&FJ Mercury {Angel}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071023000321/http:/typophile.com/node/38271 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Distressed grotesque from Tazo Teas website - Faxfont {Sean Glenn} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071023000321/http:/typophile.com/node/38251 "Go to next forum topic")
author: L.a.Z.

comments.content: I can’t see your image but I think you are looking for [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20071023000321/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=97121).
Yes!!! that’s the one! thanks a lot!!!
